title: Contact Section Fields

fields.label: Show heading & subheading
fields.name: show_heading_subheading
fields.instructions: Display the heading and subheading block at the top of the section.

fields.label: Heading
fields.name: heading
fields.instructions: Large main heading (e.g. Ready to Migrate to Shopify? Let's Get Started.)
fields.placeholder: Ready to Migrate to Shopify? Let's Get Started.

fields.label: Subheading
fields.name: subheading
fields.placeholder: Stop losing sales to slow page speeds...

fields.label: Section Title
fields.name: section_title
fields.instructions: Main heading for the contact section

fields.label: Section Description
fields.name: section_description
fields.default_value: We offer various pricing models to give our clients the flexibility they need.

fields.label: Benefits List
fields.name: benefits
fields.instructions: List of benefits with checkmark icons

default_value.text: Let's set up an introductory call.
Discuss your plans, goals, and our solutions.
You choose the plan that works best for you.
We shake hands and make agreements.

fields.label: Email Button Text
fields.name: email_button_text
fields.instructions: Text displayed on the email button (leave empty to use email address)

fields.label: Custom Form Code
fields.name: custom_code
fields.instructions: Paste your custom form HTML code here. This will replace the default form. You can use shortcodes, embed third-party forms (like Contact Form 7, Gravity Forms, etc.), or custom HTML.
fields.placeholder:
Paste your form code here...

Example:
[contact-form-7 id="123" title="Contact form 1"]

Or custom HTML:
<form>...</form>

description: ACF fields for the Contact Section block
